synopsis.text: Living alone for the first time, Yuno, a budding artist, finds herself in the vibrant Hidamari Apartments after being accepted into the prestigious Yamabuki Arts High School. Surrounded by fellow art enthusiasts, Yuno quickly befriends her eccentric neighbors: Miyako, her hyperactive classmate; Hiro and Sae, two second-year students who take on the role of older sisters; and an array of peculiar characters, including a masculine landlady and a cosplay-loving teacher. As they navigate the ups and downs of art school together, Yuno and her friends create lasting memories and a support system that helps her chase her dreams.
